long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
# Add Border to Image - Chrome Extension

## Overview
Add Border to Image is a lightweight and user-friendly Chrome extension that allows you to quickly add customizable borders to any image you find online. With just a right-click, transform your favorite images with beautiful borders.

## Features
- Simple right-click menu integration
- Instant border customization
- Works on any image across the web
- No image upload required - processes images directly
- Lightweight and fast performance
- Privacy-focused - no data collection

## How to Use
1. Find an image you want to add a border to while browsing
2. Right-click on the image
3. Select "add border to image" from the context menu
4. Customize your border settings in the new tab
5. Save or share your bordered image

## Privacy Policy
This extension does not collect or store any personal data. Images are processed locally in your browser and through our secure image processing service. We respect your privacy and ensure a safe experience.
https://imageaddborder.com/privacy

## Technical Details
- Built with modern web technologies
- Minimal permissions required
- Regular updates and maintenance
- Open source code available for transparency

## Support
For support, feature requests, or bug reports, please visit our GitHub repository or contact us through the Chrome Web Store.
